title: Square blocks instead of text.
body:
I encountered this problem since I started playing league of legends. 
when I type in english everything is ok. but when I try to type any other language I see only square blocks. 
I am trying to write in russian but don't know how to solve this problem. 
I am playing at EU Nordic if that's matter.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Creep Crusher,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wHEicaRN,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-11T14:34:32.671+0000)
>
> I encountered this problem since I started playing league of legends. 
> when I type in english everything is ok. but when I try to type any other language I see only square blocks. 
> I am trying to write in russian but don&#039;t know how to solve this problem. 
> I am playing at EU Nordic if that&#039;s matter.

How are things on russian server?Are q times long?

Each region has there specific languages that are supported.  In this case, the language you are using is not supported on EUNE so it will come up as blocks since it's unrecognized.  Our [supported languages ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language)guide can help clear things up.  I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wHEicaRN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-11T15:33:02.915+0000)
>
> Each region has there specific languages that are supported.  In this case, the language you are using is not supported on EUNE so it will come up as blocks since it's unrecognized.  Our [supported languages ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language)guide can help clear things up.  I hope that helps!

ok. thank you very much! :)
